name: Sail Boat Stained Glass Panel
description:
Due to the popularity of this design I have made a short series with gorgeous turquoise and orange sail boat surrounded by various types of textured glass made using traditional stained glass leading techniques. All glass used in this piece is reclaimed and so each panel is slightly different. Will look lovely hung or leaning in a sunny window
Hanging chain included
14 x 18.5 cm

name: Stained Glass Bunting
description:
I had lots of fun making these cheerful bunting flags. Each pack comes with 5 10 cm long flags strung on thick contrasting ribbon with loops at the end for easy hanging. Each flag is unique and made from reclaimed waste stained glass in a rainbow of colours and constructed using the copper foil (tiffany) technique.
If you would like a longer string or specific colours, please message me, I can easily do you a custom order.

name: small stained glass heart
description: Each of these little hearts is unique and hung with contrasting beads and bronze thread. All made using reclaimed glass from my larger projects. Please let me know if you have a particular colour choice in mind, or I will send you a lucky (always lovely) dip
